english.segment1: I draw near to You. You draw near to me. I bow at Your feet. I lay down my dreams. Whatever You want from me. Lord, I will do. This is my worship to You
english.segment2: CHORUS. You are all I see. You are all I see. The world fades away. With all my heart. And all my soul. And all my mind and strength. I worship You
english.segment3: I bow at Your feet. I lay down my dreams. Whatever You want from me. Lord, I will do. This is my worship to You
